day_1.weather_suggestion: The weather in Tokyo during mid-May is generally pleasant, with average temperatures ranging from 15-25째C (59-77째F). Expect mostly sunny or partly cloudy skies. Pack light clothing with a light jacket or sweater for cooler evenings.

activities.name: Explore the Imperial Palace East Garden
activities.description: Visit the former site of Edo Castle, now a public park offering beautiful gardens and historical sites.
activities.distance_to_next: approx. 20 minutes by subway to Ginza

activities.name: Ginza District Exploration
activities.description: Wander through Ginza, known for its upscale shops, department stores, and art galleries. Enjoy window shopping or explore the Kabuki-za Theatre.
activities.distance_to_next: approx. 15 minutes by subway to Shinjuku

activities.name: Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden
activities.description: Relax in this beautiful garden offering a blend of Japanese, English, and French garden styles.

food_recommendations.name: Ichiran Ramen (Shinjuku)
food_recommendations.dietary_notes: Offers customizable ramen with options to adjust broth richness, toppings, and spice level. Can accommodate some dietary restrictions with modifications.

food_recommendations.name: Tsukiji Outer Market (Near Ginza)
food_recommendations.dietary_notes: Offers a variety of seafood dishes and street food. Great option for trying local delicacies.

accommodation_recommendation.name: Hotel Gracery Shinjuku (Godzilla Head Hotel) or Similar
accommodation_recommendation.notes: Consider a hotel in Shinjuku for easy access to transportation and attractions. Alternatively, explore Airbnb options for potentially more affordable and spacious accommodations.

local_events.name: Sanja Matsuri Festival (Mid-May, if dates align)
local_events.description: One of Tokyo's largest and wildest festivals, showcasing traditional music, dancing, and portable shrines.
local_events.suitability: Depends on exact dates within May and user's interest in cultural festivals.

day_2.weather_suggestion: Similar to Tokyo, expect pleasant weather in Hakone with average temperatures around 15-25째C (59-77째F). Be prepared for potential changes in weather due to the mountainous region.

activities.name: Hakone Ropeway
activities.description: Enjoy stunning views of Mount Fuji (weather permitting) and volcanic hot springs from the Hakone Ropeway.

activities.name: Lake Ashi Cruise
activities.description: Take a scenic cruise across Lake Ashi, surrounded by beautiful mountain landscapes.

activities.name: Hakone Open-Air Museum
activities.description: Explore a unique collection of contemporary sculptures set against the backdrop of the Hakone mountains.

food_recommendations.name: Hatsuhana Soba Honten (Hakone-Yumoto)
food_recommendations.dietary_notes: Offers traditional soba noodle dishes with various toppings. Vegetarian options may be available; inquire when ordering.

food_recommendations.name: Local Restaurants in Hakone
food_recommendations.dietary_notes: Many restaurants in Hakone offer Japanese cuisine. Look for restaurants with English menus, or use translation apps for easier ordering.

day_2.travel_between: Approx. 1.5-2 hours from Tokyo to Hakone by train (Odakyu Romancecar is recommended for comfort and direct access)

accommodation_recommendation.name: Same Hotel in Shinjuku
accommodation_recommendation.notes: Return to your accommodation in Tokyo for the night. This reduces the hassle of checking in and out of different hotels.
